languages.text: "Эти люди еще могут послужить Империуму. Любой бы оправдал их страдания".

traits.locale_text: "Эти люди еще послужат Империуму. Их страдания оправданы".

languages.text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."
languages.original_text: "Эти люди еще могут послужить Империуму. Любой бы оправдал их страдания".

traits.locale_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."
"These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."
"These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."
"These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

languages.text: “这些人依然可以为帝国服务。无论换做是谁，都会同意他们的痛苦是个可以接受的代价。”
languages.original_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

traits.locale_text: “这些人依然可以为帝国服务。无论换做是谁，都会同意他们的痛苦是个可以接受的代价。”

languages.text: «Esta gente aún puede servir al Imperium. Su sufrimiento es un precio justo por la información que nos pueden proporcionar».
languages.original_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

traits.locale_text: «Esta gente aún puede servir al Imperium. Su sufrimiento es un precio justo por la información que nos pueden proporcionar».

languages.text: 「この者たちは、まだ帝国に仕えることができる。彼らの苦しみは、誰もが公平な代償だとみなすだろう」
languages.original_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

traits.locale_text: 「この者たちは、まだ帝国に仕えることができる。彼らの苦しみは、誰もが公平な代償だとみなすだろう」

languages.text: "Diese Menschen können dem Imperium immer noch dienen. Jeder würde ihr Leid als angemessenen Preis erachten."
languages.original_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Menschen können dem Imperium immer noch dienen. Jeder würde ihr Leid als angemessenen Preis erachten."

languages.text: « Ces gens peuvent toujours servir l'Imperium. N'importe qui estimerait que leur souffrance est un juste prix à payer. »
languages.original_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

traits.locale_text: « Ces gens peuvent toujours servir l'Imperium. N'importe qui estimerait que leur souffrance est un juste prix à payer. »

languages.text: "Bu insanlar hâlâ İmparatorluk'a hizmet edebilir. Çektikleri acının dava uğruna ödenebilecek bir bedel olduğu aşikâr."
languages.original_text: "These people can still serve the Imperium. Anyone would deem their suffering a fair price to pay."

traits.locale_text: “Bu insanlar İmparatorluk’a hizmet edebilir. Çektikleri acının dava uğruna ödenebilecek bir bedel olduğu aşikâr.”
